text: Need Tyler Scott for Nando's campaign. Budget around $31,600, looking for 1 x Social media takeover, 2 x Behind-the-scenes content, 1 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Media interview, 2 x 90-second product demo. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
